name: Solana Foundation
description: The Solana Foundation is a non-profit organization that supports the development and growth of the Solana ecosystem.

name: POKT Network
description: POKT Network provides a decentralized RPC for cost-effective, scalable, and resilient Web3 infrastructure.

name: SEDA
description: SEDA offers modular data transport and querying standards for any data type across all networks.

name: Plume Network
description: Plume is an L2 blockchain that simplifies asset deployment and fosters a composable ecosystem through DeFi applications.

name: Cred Protocol
description: Cred Protocol provides credit reporting and analytics for onchain activity.

name: SpherePay
description: SpherePay streamlines financial transactions for businesses, automating back-office operations at OTC rates.

name: DYDX
description: DYDX is a perpetual trading platform backed by top investors.

name: Helius
description: High-performance Solana RPCs. Enhance your apps with speedy Solana RPC nodes, optimized for reliability and backed by 24/7 support.

name: LI.FI
description: LI.FI aggregates advanced Bridge & DEX Aggregation for cross-chain data messaging and multichain strategies.

name: Goldfinch
description: Goldfinch offers stablecoin returns through lending to successful credit funds and fintechs in emerging markets, collateralized by real-world assets.

name: AAVE
description: AAVE is an open-source protocol that creates non-custodial liquidity markets with variable or stable interest rates.

name: Access
description: Access provides a subscription-based platform for publishing written content, minting NFTs, and building communities on Discord & Telegram.

name: Blackbird
description: Blackbird allows users to earn status, perks, and points at world-class restaurants.

name: Wonderverse
description: Wonderverse is a Discord bot that offers onboarding, engagement, and monetization tools for premium communities.

name: Humanode
description: Humanode uses private biometric technology to create a crypto-biometric network with sybil resistance and innovative governance models.

name: Hivemapper
description: Hivemapper offers real-time data on traffic, weather, and other events through its global coverage network.

name: Snapshot
description: Snapshot is an off-chain voting platform that allows DAOs, DeFi protocols, or NFT communities to participate in decentralized governance without gas fees.

name: Odyssey
description: Odyssey is a platform for exploring products across the new era of the web, completing quizzes, verifying activities, and following communities.

name: Atoma Network
description: Atoma Network provides AI tools for creators and innovators.

name: Shiza
description: Shiza connects people through INTERCONNECTED INTELLECT.

name: Camp
description: Camp is a user identity layer across blockchains that aggregates online user data while enabling users to own and monetize their identities.

name: Sphere One
description: Sphere One enables the creation of Next-Gen AI Tools.

name: Heurist
description: Heurist is a Layer 2 blockchain protocol for decentralized AI model hosting and inference.

name: MentaPort
description: MentaPort protects copyrighted content from deepfakes using immutable certificates and embedded watermark technology.

name: Define Protocol
description: Define Protocol offers a decentralized web3 system for verifying and sharing credentials in a privacy-preserving manner.

name: Henry Social
description: Henry Social rewards users with instant cashback on their favorite brands.

name: Layer3
description: Layer3 provides modular distribution and identity infrastructure for the omnichain future.

name: Jumper
description: Jumper is an exchange that aggregates all of DeFi liquidity, ensuring the best routes for any token transaction.
